events.description: The Nikkei 225 Index fell 0.78% to close at 54,293 on Wednesday.
An upcoming election in Japan where the ruling LDP is expected to expand its seat count.

facts.fact_text: The Nikkei 225 Index fell 0.78% to close at 54,293 on Wednesday.

evidences.evidence_text: The Nikkei 225 Index fell 0.78% to close at 54,293 on Wednesday

facts.fact_text: Nintendo shares plunged 11% after slowing momentum in its Switch 2 console.

evidences.evidence_text: Nintendo plunged 11% after momentum in its flagship Switch 2 console slowed

facts.fact_text: Ibiden fell 14.2% following weak third-quarter results.

evidences.evidence_text: Electronics maker Ibiden tumbled 14.2% on weak Q3 results

facts.fact_text: Advantest, Lasertec, SoftBank Group, Hitachi, and NEC Corp all saw share price declines.

evidences.evidence_text: Other notable decliners included Advantest (-2.1%), Lasertec (-7.2%), SoftBank Group (-2.2%), Hitachi (-4.1%), and NEC Corp (-11.8%).

claims.claim_text: Disappointing earnings from specific companies negatively impacted market sentiment.

evidences.evidence_text: disappointing earnings from select companies weighed on sentiment

claims.claim_text: Investors are rotating out of high-value technology stocks into cyclical sectors.

evidences.evidence_text: investors rotating out of richly valued technology stocks and into more cyclical sectors

claims.claim_text: The ruling LDP is expected to win more seats and implement expansionary fiscal policies.

evidences.evidence_text: the ruling LDP is expected to expand its seat count and push forward expansionary fiscal policies under Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi

evidence.evidence_text: Japanese equities also tracked a tech-led selloff on Wall Street
this weekend’s snap lower house election, where the ruling LDP is expected to expand its seat count and push forward expansionary fiscal policies
Nintendo plunged 11% after... the company maintained, rather than upgraded, its annual earnings and hardware forecasts
